group_1.textLeft: Okay, let's like all get to know each other!@[chara:300601:motion_200]My name's Emiri Kisaki.
I just want to have a nice chat with all you @guys today, y'know? Let's have some fun![chara:300601:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json]
Call me Emiri, Emily, Em—@Whatever you want!

group_1.textRight: The cute girls always have the cutest names!

group_1.textLeft: Whoa, look out! Smooth talker over here!@Watch yourselves, girls![chara:300601:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json]

group_1.textRight: Hahaha, oh man, tough crowd!

group_1.textLeft: I'll go next!
I came here...[chara:303101:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json:motion_100:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]to meet my Prince Charming!

group_1.textRight: Woooooo!

group_1.textLeft: My name's Rika Ayano.@Nice to meet you!

group_1.textRight: If you're looking for a prince,@I might have to go get my crown.

group_1.textLeft: Somebody's a bit eager!

group_1.textRight: Ahahaha!

group_1.textLeft: (I'm way out of my league here...)
(I'm not just a fish out of water...@I'm a fish that's been blasted into space!)

group_1.textRight: And who's sitting beside you, there?

group_1.textLeft: You're up, Miyako-senpai!
Ugh!
Er, um...

group_1.textRight: Awww, feeling a bit nervous today?
Is this Baby's First Mixer?

group_1.textLeft: What?!@[chara:300301:cheek_1:face_mtn_ex_020.exp.json:motion_200:effect_emotion_angry_0][se:7219_strain]Y-you shut your mouth!
I may not look it—no, you know what?@[chara:300301:motion_300]I do look it! I'm older than you think!
I'm older than all of you!

group_1.textRight: Huh? Are you serious?!@You look like a little kid!

group_1.textLeft: You shouldn't judge someone based@on how they look, you scoundrel!

group_1.textRight: Pfft!@She called me a scoundrel!
So, what?@We in drama class right now?

group_1.textLeft: What are you talking about?

group_1.textRight: The way you talk, it just seems a little@over the top.

group_1.textLeft: No, I'm just...like...

group_1.textRight: Hehehe!@She's "just like," you guys!
Hah!@Wow, you're funny!

group_1.textLeft: Y'know what—!
Wait, what's so funny about that?@Care to explain?
Huh?

group_1.textRight: She talks so weird!@Seriously, who talks like that?
Not normal girls, that's for sure!

group_1.textLeft: Funny because she's...different?@Weird because she's not...normal?

group_1.textRight: Er, well...

group_1.textLeft: I don't find that very funny at all.
What even is "normal," anyway?

group_1.textRight: Whoa... Look, I wasn't trying to...y'know...@[chara:800400:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json]I'm sorry, okay?

group_1.textLeft: No, it's... It's...um...

group_1.textRight: Okay, [chara:300601:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]I'm back! What'd I mi—
Whoooa, you guys, what happened to the@vibe in here?!

group_1.textLeft: Nothing. Nothing at all.
But now that you're back, it's time to eat!

group_1.textRight: Uhhh... Yeah!@[chara:800500:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json]Yeah, let's do that!
H'okay!

group_1.textLeft: Where were you, anyway?@I turned around and you were gone!

group_1.textRight: Just to the bathroom for, y'know...stuff?

group_1.textLeft: Five minutes in and you've gotta go to@the bathroom? Should we get you a diaper?
Bahahaha!@Nice one, Miyako-senpai!

group_1.textRight: Wahaha!

group_1.textLeft: Huh?@Oh...ha...ha...
Phew!@You got me good with that one!
(She really stuck up for me back there...)
(Sorry, Rika.)
(Guess I'd better take my own advice and@stop judging people based on their looks...)
